snippet.title: Blood warrior red edition android Gameplay
snippet.description:
link--https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pancakegames.bwinfinitywar

Game description: Blood warrior: Red edition:

Blood warrior: Red edition - take a powerful warrior through dark dungeons, abandoned castles and other gloomy locations full of evil spirits and monsters. Plunge into a fantasy world of this Android game. Explore dangerous lands and fight against dark powers. Apply powerful fighting skills of your character to destroy skeletons, zombies and demonic monsters. Challenge mighty bosses. Gather trophies, upgrade weapons, munitions and other outfit of your hero. Get pets which will help you in the battles against strong opponents.

Game features:

Over 145 stages
2 difficulty levels
20 fighting pets
Wide range of munitions
High score

The game requires an Internet connection
